mapper.select: SELECT a.columnId pcolumnId, a.columnName pcolumnName, a.columnLink pcolumnLink, a.images pcolumnImg, b.columnId scolumnId, b.columnName scolumnName, b.columnLink scolumnLink FROM ( SELECT * FROM website_columns a WHERE a.columnParent IS NULL) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM website_columns b WHERE b.columnParent IS NOT null) b ON a.columnId = b.columnParent ORDER BY a.columnSort DESC

SELECT columnId,columnName,columnLink,isJump,images FROM website_columns WHERE isDel = '0'
AND columnParent = #{columnId}
AND columnParent IS NULL
ORDER BY columnSort ASC
